metadata.title: CVE-2023-42883 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 17.2, macOS Sonoma 14.2, iOS 17.2 and iPadOS 17.2, watchOS 10.2,tvOS 17.2, iOS 16.7.3 and iPadOS 16.7.3. Processing an image may lead to adenial-of-service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42883` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.42.4-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
